statements: SELECT * FROM product_recalls
SELECT product_name, batch_number FROM product_recalls
SELECT id, product_name, recall_reason FROM product_recalls WHERE batch_number = 12345
SELECT * FROM product_recalls WHERE recall_reason LIKE '%safety%'
SELECT product_name, batch_number, recall_reason FROM product_recalls ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM product_recalls WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, batch_number FROM product_recalls WHERE batch_number > 100;
SELECT id, product_name, recall_reason FROM product_recalls WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM product_recalls WHERE recall_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY batch_number DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM product_recalls ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM batch_tracking_product;
SELECT product_id, batch_number FROM batch_tracking_product WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT recall_reason, recall_date FROM recall_tracking ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, production_date, expiration_date FROM batch_tracking_product WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, recall_reason FROM batch_tracking_product JOIN recall_tracking ON batch_tracking_product.product_id = recall_tracking.product_id;
SELECT * FROM batch_tracking_product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, batch_number FROM batch_tracking_product WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT recall_id, product_id, recall_reason FROM recall_tracking WHERE recall_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recall_tracking WHERE recall_reason LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT product_id, production_date, expiration_date FROM batch_tracking_product ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_batch;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM product_batch ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT batch_id, product_name FROM product_batch WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT recall_id, reason, recall_date FROM recalled_batches WHERE reason LIKE '%contamination%';
SELECT notification_id, notification_type FROM recall_notifications ORDER BY notification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_batch ORDER BY product_name DESC, production_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT batch_id, product_name, production_date FROM product_batch WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01' AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT pb.product_name, rb.reason FROM product_batch pb JOIN recalled_batches rb ON pb.batch_id = rb.batch_id WHERE rb.reason LIKE '%contamination%';
SELECT rn.notification_type, rn.notification_date FROM recall_notifications rn JOIN recalled_batches rb ON rn.recall_id = rb.recall_id WHERE rb.reason = 'expired';
SELECT pb.product_name, COUNT(rb.recall_id) AS num_recalls FROM product_batch pb JOIN recalled_batches rb ON pb.batch_id = rb.batch_id GROUP BY pb.product_name HAVING num_recalls > 1;
SELECT * FROM ProductBatch;
SELECT product_id, production_date FROM ProductBatch ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT batch_id, production_date FROM ProductBatch WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProductRecall;
SELECT recall_id, reason FROM ProductRecall WHERE batch_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM RecallNotification JOIN RecallStatus ON RecallNotification.recall_id = RecallStatus.recall_id
SELECT notification_text, notification_date FROM RecallNotification JOIN ProductRecall ON RecallNotification.recall_id = ProductRecall.recall_id WHERE ProductRecall.reason = 'Expired Product'
SELECT ProductBatch.production_date, ProductBatch.expiration_date, ProductRecall.reason FROM ProductBatch JOIN ProductRecall ON ProductBatch.batch_id = ProductRecall.batch_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_recalls FROM ProductRecall WHERE recall_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT ProductBatch.product_id FROM ProductBatch JOIN ProductRecall ON ProductBatch.batch_id = ProductRecall.batch_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM products WHERE batch_number > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM batches WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT product_name, batch_number FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, batch_number, expiry_date FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, batch_number, manufacturing_date FROM products ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_batches FROM products JOIN batches ON products.product_id = batches.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT r.reason, p.product_name, b.manufacturing_location FROM recalls r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id JOIN batches b ON r.batch_id = b.batch_id WHERE r.recall_date > '2021-06-01';
